title: Maingear launches signature desktop gaming PC from streamer Shroud
description: Maingear unveiled a Signature Edition desktop gaming PC designed in collaboration with popular Twitch streamer Shroud.
author: Dean Takahashi
excerpt: Maingear unveiled a Signature Edition desktop gaming PC designed in collaboration with popular Twitch streamer Shroud.
text: January 6, 2025 4:15 PM Maingear has a new gaming desktop endorsed by streamer Shroud.Image Credit: Maingear Maingear unveiled a Signature Edition desktop gaming PC designed in collaboration with popular Twitch streamer Shroud. Known for its high-end gaming PCs, Maingear has configured and designed the machine in collaboration with esports legend and livestreamer, Shroud, who has more than 11 million followers on Twitch. He is known for his prowess in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and Valorant. Maingear unveiled the gaming PC at CES 2025, the big tech trade show in Las Vegas this week. Panoramic gaming The Maingear Shroud’s chassis features a UniSheet heat-formed panoramic glass case design that showcases every system component to its max RGB glory. The Shroud Signature Edition also includes a unique in-case LCD screen, Shroud’s oversized signature on the glass GPU airflow intake director, and a serialized badge inspired by his pinball machine collection. Each system is personalized as a ‘badge of honor,’ showcasing the serialized order number and build date, as well as CPU, and GPU specs. Specs Maingear Shroud Signature Edition gaming PC. Maingear said the top tier components include: ● Chassis: Maingear Shroud Signature Edition (based on the HS 420 VGPU chassis from HAVN) — available in black or white● CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D — The fastest gaming CPU on the market● GPU: Latest top-tier NVIDIA GeForce RTX GPU — The best GPU available from NVIDIA with DLSS, RTX Ray-tracing and Reflex low-latency technology● Motherboard: AsRock Phantom Gaming X870E Nova WiFi — premium power delivery with 20+2+1 VRM Design; premium server-grade low-loss PCB with 2oz copper inner layers; 20K Black capacitors with 1000uF Capacitance● RAM: 48GB T-Force Xtreem ARGB 8000MHz CL34 — fine-tuned in house to maximize memory clock speed and stability; uni-body RGB diffuser design● Storage: 2TB T-Force Cardea A440 Gen4 M.2 SSD (7000Mbps/6900Mbs) — high-speed gaming drive with maximum stability● Power Supply: 1200W FSP PTM Pro Gen5 80+/Cybernetics Platinum — Japanese capacitors; braided sleeved cables/Extensions matching chassis color● Cooling: Maingear Epic 420mm AiO Liquid Cooler — liquid-metal thermal interface material with CPU; 420mm of 25mm thick radiator heat dissipation with triple 30mm Phanteks D30-140 fans “These new Maingear PCs are the perfect embodiment of my style. They’re minimalist, clean, and packan insane amount of power. It’s the kind of rig that lets you focus on the game, knowing your system willcrush the competition,” said Shroud, in a statement. Availability The Maingear Shroud Signature Edition desktop gaming PCs will be available soon exclusively throughMaingear’s official website. Maingear will offer an upgrade program for the shroud Signature Edition owners, allowing customers to purchase the latest, Shroud Signature Edition hardware packages over time. Each upgrade version willbe thoroughly tested by Maingear to ensure maximum stability at the bleeding edge before beingreleased. With each upgrade version, customers will receive a new magnetic ‘badge of honor’ reflectingtheir system’s latest hardware specs. Maingear will also launch the Shroud custom desktops with an online configurator. Shroud custom desktop PCs will allow customers to build a penultimate shroud system exactly as they want it in the Maingear Shroud chassis. Options include vertical or horizontal GPU mounts, chassis color, and a variety of component options up to the shroud Signature Edition spec. With demand for these groundbreaking systems expected to soar, Maingear is inviting gamers and enthusiasts to secure their spot in the build queue with a fully refundable $100 reservation deposit, which will apply toward the purchase price. This risk-free deposit not only ensures early access to these systems but also guarantees a place among the first to experience them. GB Daily Stay in the know! html:
January 6, 2025 4:15 PM

Maingear has a new gaming desktop endorsed by streamer Shroud.

Image Credit: Maingear

Maingear unveiled a Signature Edition desktop gaming PC designed in collaboration with popular Twitch streamer Shroud.

Known for its high-end gaming PCs, Maingear has configured and designed the machine in collaboration with esports legend and livestreamer, Shroud, who has more than 11 million followers on Twitch. He is known for his prowess in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and Valorant.

Maingear unveiled the gaming PC at CES 2025, the big tech trade show in Las Vegas this week.

Panoramic gaming

The Maingear Shroud’s chassis features a UniSheet heat-formed panoramic glass case design that showcases every system component to its max RGB glory.

The Shroud Signature Edition also includes a unique in-case LCD screen, Shroud’s oversized signature on the glass GPU airflow intake director, and a serialized badge inspired by his pinball machine collection.

Each system is personalized as a ‘badge of honor,’ showcasing the serialized order number and build date, as well as CPU, and GPU specs.

Specs

Maingear said the top tier components include:

● Chassis: Maingear Shroud Signature Edition (based on the HS 420 VGPU chassis from HAVN) — available in black or white
● CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D — The fastest gaming CPU on the market
● GPU: Latest top-tier NVIDIA GeForce RTX GPU — The best GPU available from NVIDIA with DLSS, RTX Ray-tracing and Reflex low-latency technology
● Motherboard: AsRock Phantom Gaming X870E Nova WiFi — premium power delivery with 20+2+1 VRM Design; premium server-grade low-loss PCB with 2oz copper inner layers; 20K Black capacitors with 1000uF Capacitance
● RAM: 48GB T-Force Xtreem ARGB 8000MHz CL34 — fine-tuned in house to maximize memory clock speed and stability; uni-body RGB diffuser design
● Storage: 2TB T-Force Cardea A440 Gen4 M.2 SSD (7000Mbps/6900Mbs) — high-speed gaming drive with maximum stability
● Power Supply: 1200W FSP PTM Pro Gen5 80+/Cybernetics Platinum — Japanese capacitors; braided sleeved cables/Extensions matching chassis color
● Cooling: Maingear Epic 420mm AiO Liquid Cooler — liquid-metal thermal interface material with CPU; 420mm of 25mm thick radiator heat dissipation with triple 30mm Phanteks D30-140 fans

“These new Maingear PCs are the perfect embodiment of my style. They’re minimalist, clean, and pack
an insane amount of power. It’s the kind of rig that lets you focus on the game, knowing your system will
crush the competition,” said Shroud, in a statement.

Availability

The Maingear Shroud Signature Edition desktop gaming PCs will be available soon exclusively through
Maingear’s official website.

Maingear will offer an upgrade program for the shroud Signature Edition owners, allowing customers to purchase the latest, Shroud Signature Edition hardware packages over time. Each upgrade version will
be thoroughly tested by Maingear to ensure maximum stability at the bleeding edge before being
released. With each upgrade version, customers will receive a new magnetic ‘badge of honor’ reflecting
their system’s latest hardware specs.

Maingear will also launch the Shroud custom desktops with an online configurator. Shroud custom desktop PCs will allow customers to build a penultimate shroud system exactly as they want it in the Maingear Shroud chassis.

Options include vertical or horizontal GPU mounts, chassis color, and a variety of component options up to the shroud Signature Edition spec.

With demand for these groundbreaking systems expected to soar, Maingear is inviting gamers and enthusiasts to secure their spot in the build queue with a fully refundable $100 reservation deposit, which will apply toward the purchase price. This risk-free deposit not only ensures early access to these systems but also guarantees a place among the first to experience them.
